Message.Msg: Gee Gee has a "critical number" for every situation. He counts the number of pecks per minute by his parakeet minus the number of meows by his cat and multiplies by six to get them.

Message.Title: Sybil, the oracle of the "trading gods"
Message.Msg: Those who ignore Sybil will regret it. Chipotle bulls learned that lesson months ago.

Message.Title: 3000 years to pay back
Message.Msg: Great Article on Fortune just compares PE ratios and its meaning. "Because PE is a measure of earnings over time, you can think of it as representing the number of years required to pay back a stock's purchase price (ignoring inflation, earnings growth and the time value of money). Put another way, if it takes Apple 13 years to pay back your initial investment, it will take Amazon nearly three millennia."
I'm surprised that people are buying the stock without regard to the underlying fundamentals.
Isn't that Einstein's formula for Energy/Mass conversion? Same thing applies to AMZN stock price.

Topic.Title: Sybil, the oracle of the "trading gods"

Message.Msg: Ex.goldbug, Sybil thanks you for the props and doles out a thumbs up with gratitude... Even kinder to sybs trade acct than cmg mexican pork product was shorting the pcln flying travel pig... The powerful trading gods have graciously thrown pcln back in front of sybil to short - this time with an apple (not to be confused with aapl) stuffed in its mouth ready to carve.... Sybil shorted 100 sharez of pcln at a wopping 650 on friday. The trading gods have delivered this piggy complete with a death cross in full play.... Theze markets have never been so ripe for shorting - chock full of pigz.... Yes the trading gods are kind indeed... Today at sunday brunch they said.... "sybil, you have been respectful to the gods. We shall sanction your tradez.... You have done well to short the markets. Hold your shorts and add to them any rips, and you shall be rewarded... Spread the word to those that will listen, and those that do not listen shall have the words of acidic markets spread upon them with which they shall writh in pain while their trade accounts are liquified.... Now go" Now this iz the most sybs haz known the trading gods to speak ..... Sybil shall heed their word.

Message.Title: AMZN forced to collect taxes
Message.Msg: AMZN is losing one of its biggest advantages - they are being forced to collect taxes in more and more states. By next year, they would be at par with the brick-n' mortar stores. No more checking the product out at Best Buy and buying it at Amazon, so that you don't have to pay taxes. The playing field is being leveled and brick-n' mortar stores could not be happier.

Message.Title: Do you buy Electonic Gadget with retail, aution, restaurant or book store brands?
Message.Msg: Would you buy a McDonald Tablet or a Walmart Reader? Come on Amazon and Barn & Noble made nothing except rebadging Chinese made generic brand. I don't care how good or how cheap their products are, you don't know where or who made those products for them and I don't trust them and I don't want them. Amazon and Barn & Noble don't even have an assembly line so where are those Tablets/E-Readers coming from? From an underground Chinese factory. Any company that has money can bran a tablet, a reader, a laptop, a TV or even a car with their name. GM rebadged Daewoo and named it Chevy Sonic, Chevy Spark, Chevy Cruze and rebadge Opel and named it Buick.
